pages.text: $(d)Sakanade Spores$() when walked through, will apply the $(3)Collapse$() potion effect to entities.$(br2)For players, the Collapse effect inverts their movement and mouse controls.$(br2)For mobs, it confuses their pathfinding, causing them to move erratically.
pages.title: Sakanade Spores

pages.text: Sakanade Spores can be found on the bottom of Giant Brown Mushrooms.
